price: 48. Мре kanga motema (Muhammad) na kozela mokano ya Nkolo nayo, kasi kozala lokola moto oyo azalaki na libumu ya mbisi te (Yûnus), tango abelelaki (Allah) na kati ya mawa ya monene.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
